name: ChickenHouse (dongfangliu)
description:
We did this game within48hr in 2018 GGJ. 

Just for fun

This is a game for two players. Separates , one controls a hen and the other controls a rooster. They have eggs which gradually born into chickens. 

What players should do is 3 things:

1.find worms to feed chicken

2.prevent chickens from going around

3.shelf chickens and component from eagles’ attack
